page.title: 01THE POSITION OF GLADESTRY
page.content: Our area is in Wales. We are near the border with England. Our county is Powys. Our part of Powys is called Radnorshire. We live in the Radnorshire Hills. There are no towns near us. Kington is our nearest town but it is only small. There are 2000 people in Kington. Kington is in Herefordshire in England. It is five miles to Kington from Gladestry. The nearest big town is Hereford. It is twenty six miles to Hereford from Gladestry. Hereford is where there are big shops. Our area is rural. We have no factories around Gladestry. There are mostly farms. There are not many people in Gladestry. There are more sheep than people. A lot of people from outside come to live in Gladestry and many come to retire here because they like the quiet way of life.
